welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cranford, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, bustling downtown area, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as a hub for United Airlines and handles domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves as a hub for United Airlines and handles domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate flights, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
